sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Football favourite Kylian Mbappe is set to continue at Paris Saint-Germain after French and international media outlets announce his extension.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Mariupol falls after Russia captures the Azovstal steel plant and its last Ukrainian fighters surrender.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Kharkiv is liberated but remains vigilant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The number of detected monkeypox cases continues to grow, with France, Germany, Belgium and Australia reporting their first infections on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Spain's former King Juan Carlos' first trip home after two years in exile sparks widespread criticism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Footballer Kylian Mbappe will play with Paris Saint-Germain for another three years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: According to daily newspaper Le Quipe, the French superstar who secured his Team 36 goals this season stays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Months of negotiations with Real Madrid failed to secure the three-time consecutive winner of the League One Player of the Year award a contract with the Spanish side.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But French and Spanish media sources both say the forward will announce extension on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After three months of siege which left the majority of Mariupol in ruins, Russia has announced the capture of the entire port city after seizing the Azov-style steelworks plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The plant was home to the last pocket of Ukrainian resistance within the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russian state media reported almost 2,500 Ukrainian fighters stationed there had surrendered since Monday, including 500 on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian fighters stationed there had surrendered since Monday, including 500 on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some of the captured soldiers were said to be hospitalized, while others were taken to a penal colony.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Their futures are uncertain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: After failing to seize Kyiv and Kharkiv, Ukrainian military authorities say Russia is concentrating its efforts on the east and south of the country, notably to secure the Donetsk and luhansk regions despite having pushed back russian offenses harkiv remains vigilant and is regularly subjected to shelling from russian troops in his nightly address ukrainian president volodymyr zlensky says russia should be held financially accountable for all the destruction caused we urge our partner countries to legally recognize that russia must be held financially responsible for the crimes it has committed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This is important not only in the context of this war waged by Russia, but also in the context of any other aggressive actions, whether by Russia or any other potential aggressor. Evil must be answered and know that it will be punished.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Evil must be answered and know that it will be punished.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the Donetsk region, there are those who are still undecided whether to stay or go.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some leave because the Russian offensive has left them with nothing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Others feel they cannot leave because of their age or just because they cannot bear to leave their homes behind.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Monkeypox is being detected worldwide, with health care officials having reported around

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: 80 cases of the disease.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And the World Health Organization has reported another 50 suspected infections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On Friday, France, Germany, Belgium and Australia joined the growing list of countries with the confirmed cases.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The monkeypox virus is considered to have moderate transmissibility among humans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The likelihood of further spread of the virus through close contact, for example through sexual activities, is considered to be high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The viral disease is fatal for about one in ten people, according to the World Health Organization, and there are ways to treat the illness.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: People exposed to the virus are often given one of several smallpox vaccines, and antiviral drugs are also being developed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is a drug that was developed under sponsorship of the U.S. government, primarily to be stockpiled for use against smallpox should it ever recur or be used as a bioweapon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The particular drug, however, works against a whole family of viruses, smallpox, vaccinia, cowpox, and notably monkeypox.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's been approved for treatment of smallpox in the U.S. under the name T-pox, and it's recently approved in the EMA for treatment of all orthopoxviruses that include monkeypox.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I'm very optimistic this is going to be an effective drug.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There have been previous outbreaks of the virus in other regions, such as West and Central Africa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And in Nigeria, around 3,000 cases are reported a year, mostly in rural areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: mostly in rural areas. Over 30 people were injured in the German city of Paderborn after a tornado hit the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: west of the country on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Of those hurt, 10 are reported as serious cases.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Local authorities noted significant property damage with images showing roofs blown off, cars overturned and trees uprooted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Firefighters from all over the state of North Rhine-Westphalia have been mobilized to help with the cleanup operations in the affected towns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Other parts of the country, including Bavaria and Saxony-Anhalt, were also severely hit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: German meteorological services issued a storm warning for Friday and predicted gales of up to 130 kilometers per hour in some areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Railway travel has been disrupted and the police asked the public to remain indoors. In the city of Lipschitz, a hundred people were temporarily trapped at a local outdoor pool after fallen trees blocked the exits. The bad weather first struck the west of the country during the day and moved eastwards later in the evening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Former King Juan Carlos I has returned to Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It happened the way he wanted and surrounded by faithful friends.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But his comeback from a self-imposed exile in Abu Dhabi, now that all corruption charges against him have been dropped, partly because he enjoyed full immunity while in office, has received mixed reactions from the Spanish people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: I think he shouldn't have left, not only for what he means for this country, but also because he is a Spanish citizen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He acted so well in the 1981 attempted coup d'etat. We should forgive everything he might have done.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I think this harmful, unhealthy and dangerous individual should be held accountable for what he's done.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I think he should have come earlier, basically to explain the reasons why he left in the first place, because we still don't really know.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The king reunites with Spain the start of a new normal a media show in a regatta has confirmed the fracture in the relationship between the former king and his son Felipe it was meant to be a discreet private visit but the return of Juan Carlos has become a big affair one that has triggered political tensions in Spain within the coalition government and the royal house itself probably a majority of Spaniards Un gran caso, uno que ha provocado tensiones políticas en España, dentro del gobierno coalizante y la Casa Royal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Probablemente la mayoría de los españoles entenderán que el rey Juan Carlos viene discreetamente, se encuentra con su familia, en realidad está haciendo lo contrario.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ha venido con un teléfono, así de decir, diciendo, aquí estoy, tengo el derecho de venir.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: El más ruido que Juan Carlos I va a conocer a su hijo, el rey de España durante una visita breve el domingo en el Palacio Royal, pero no va a ser permitido dormir en la residencia oficial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Vendrá a Abu Dhabi donde continuará pero volverá pronto para otra visita privada. Jaime Velázquez, Euronews Madrid. back to Abu Dhabi where he will continue to reside but he'll return soon for yet another private visit Jaime Velázquez Euronews Madrid North Korea announced

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: finding nearly 220,000 more people with feverish symptoms this comes as leader Kim jong-un claims progress is being made to slow the spread of COVID-19 North Korea says that over 2.4 million people have fallen ill and so far 66 people have died since an unidentified fever broke out late April. The country has only been able to identify a handful of cases of COVID due to limited testing supplies and experts believe that the real numbers may be higher than those officially announced.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Since the pandemic started two and a half years ago, North Korean officials have been claiming that they managed to block the virus from entering the territory, but admitted to having cases of Omicron last week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Over one million health workers have been mobilized to find and quarantine people exhibiting fevers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Kim Jong-un also imposed strict travel restrictions between towns and cities, as well as deployed thousands of troops to help deliver medicines in Pyongyang.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: People flooded the streets of Uruguay in remembrance of those who disappeared during the military dictatorship era and to demand action to find their whereabouts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Carrying signs of the 197 victims whose fates are still unknown, tens of thousands of people marched in silence along the main avenue of the capital, Montevideo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Human rights organizations say that during the 12 years of the dictatorship, some 200 people disappeared.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Former FARC hostage Ingrid Betancourt has ended her Colombian presidential bid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: 20 years ago, she was kidnapped and held captive by rebels for over six years before being rescued in a military operation in 2008. Bettencourt ran on the ticket of her environmentalist party with a strong anti-corruption approach, but her campaign never took off. During a press conference, she announced she would support independent candidate Rodolfo Hernandez. Boeing's astronaut capsule Starliner successfully made it to the International Space Station for the first time on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This was Boeing's second attempt at launching a capsule towards the ISS, the first time ending up in the wrong orbit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This latest private company-funded space run achieves NASA's hopes of having competing U.S. companies flying crews to the space station.
